basics.name: Cody Robibero
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience building, modernizing, and operating .NET-based backend, web, and mobile systems. Specialized in large-scale platform migrations, API design, and CI/CD automation with GitHub Actions. Proven track record supporting high-volume, customer-facing products and leading complex technical initiatives.

work.name: OwnerRez
work.description: Leader in the vacation rental industry for channel management, CRM, property management, accounting, messaging, and websites
work.summary: Focused on building and maintaining high-traffic SaaS features and third-party channel integrations for a vacation rental management platform
highlights: Implemented customer-facing product features using ASP.NET MVC (Razor Pages) in collaboration with product and design teams
Delivered Booking.com contracting and onboarding workflows supporting partner integrations at scale
Implemented and maintained Vrbo onboarding flows to streamline customer adoption
Provided engineering support through technical help desk triage and issue resolution

work.name: RingSquared
work.description: Trusted provider for end-to-end managed voice, analytics, and data solutions
highlights: Streamlined ingestion pipelines processing millions of call records with improved reliability and throughput
Automated delivery of customer call records for 30,000+ clients
Built and automated Microsoft Office 365 and Teams Direct Routing provisioning using Microsoft Graph API and PowerShell
Modernized legacy .NET Framework services by upgrading to .NET 8

work.name: Nymbl Science
work.description: A highly engaged digital health program addressing the top anxiety points of aging
work.summary: Full-stack development with a focus on scalable backend APIs and platform modernization
highlights: Led full modernization of backend systems from .NET Framework to .NET 7, including migration to ASP.NET Core WebAPI and Entity Framework Core
Migrated mobile applications from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI
Designed and implemented backend services supporting multiple web and mobile applications
Built internal .NET MAUI tooling for PGP encryption and decryption workflows
Automated ingestion and processing of user eligibility files
Designed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for mobile, API, and frontend deployments across Azure
Published mobile applications to BrowserStack, TestFlight, and Google Play alpha channels

work.name: Dial800
work.description: Call and text analytics for inbound and outbound communications
work.summary: Responsible for design and implementation of all client-facing infrastructure
highlights: Developed a client portal for call history review, call routing management, and custom reporting
Built analytics services to aggregate and visualize call and SMS data in dynamic dashboards
Implemented scheduled reporting services driven by customer-defined templates
Designed and maintained SMS services for toll-free messaging
Built WebRTC-based web phone and video conferencing solutions
Developed APIs for phone number leasing, reservation, and search
Implemented automated billing and invoice generation platforms

work.name: ClassLink Inc
work.summary: Developed OneSync, a web-based service for automated account provisioning into Microsoft Active Directory and Google Directory

work.name: HVEA Engineers
work.description: Consulting engineers and construction material testing
work.summary: Designed and built an internal web application to manage samples, testing workflows, reports, and scheduling

projects.name: Jellyfin Media Server
highlights: Core contributor to a large open-source media platform used by hundreds of thousands of users worldwide
Led and maintained the Jellyfin plugin ecosystem with 30+ actively maintained plugins
Designed and implemented new server functionality while maintaining existing core features
Conducted design and code reviews for community and core contributors
